p: Throughout the study, the farms decreased in number but increased in size ( Table 1). The total number of farms visited represented 10-20% of Spanish farms, according to the year. Relative to data in Table 1, with 3-year observation periods, there were in total 190 visits due to myxomatosis and 1618 visits (calendar month), from 11 September 1988 until 11 September 1991.
